description: In the world of bruschetta, there are no rules. This bruschetta recipe heroes juicy summer nectarines and fresh goat’s cheese to satisfy your sweet-yet-savoury cravings.
name: Goat's Cheese, Rocket & Nectarine Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs olive oil, to drizzle (to drizzle)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a griddle pan on medium heat. Drizzle baguette slices with olive oil and toast on griddle until char marks appear. Season with salt.
Top baguette slices with goat’s cheese, rocket and nectarine. Dress with balsamic glaze and sprinkle over thyme leaves. Serve with lemon cheeks.
